title: Ling Mitchell: The Green Guardian
summary: Ling Mitchell, a 42-year-old instructor and gardening enthusiast, discovers his ability to control plants and uses his newfound powers to combat a mysterious pollution affecting his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Ling Mitchell, ein 42-jähriger Lehrer und Gartenliebhaber, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, Pflanzen zu kontrollieren und nutzt seine neu gefundenen Kräfte, um eine mysteriöse Verschmutzung zu bekämpfen, die seine Stadt im Laufe einer Woche beeinträchtigt.
summaryDutch: Ling Mitchell, een 42-jarige instructeur en tuinierliefhebber, ontdekt zijn vermogen om planten te beheersen en gebruikt zijn nieuw gevonden krachten om een mysterieuze vervuiling te bestrijden die zijn stad gedurende een week treft.
summaryFrench: Ling Mitchell, un instructeur de 42 ans et passionné de jardinage, découvre sa capacité à contrôler les plantes et utilise ses nouveaux pouvoirs pour combattre une pollution mystérieuse affectant sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: A typical morning of instructing at the local community center takes a turn for the eerie when Ling Mitchell notices his plants leaning towards him as if listening.
Excited by the strange events, Ling experiments in his garden and astoundingly manages to bend a vine with his mind alone. He spends the day feeling energetic and testing his abilities.
Slightly overwhelmed by his powers, Ling seeks solace in his plants, finding the peaceful connection reassuring and grounding.
Reports of the city's rivers turning black with pollution galvanize Ling into action. He uses his powers to clear a small stream, feeling triumphant.
As news of his deeds spread, Ling feels a mix of joy and responsibility. He teaches a class on sustainable gardening, injecting romance into his lectures about the earth.
Determined, Ling organizes a large clearing effort, rallying volunteers from his classes. Together, they tackle the city's most affected areas.
Reflecting on his week, Ling feels a profound peace in his garden, realizing he has made a difference. The city is cleaner, and his connection to nature is stronger than ever.

ending: As Ling looked over his lush, vibrant garden, he knew that inside every one of us is the power to change the world.
moral: Never underestimate the power of one individual to make a difference, particularly when united with nature.
